title: Targus Executive Stylus + Pen for Apple iPad, iPad mini, iPhone, iPod, and Tablets, Gun Metal Gray (AMM05TBUS)
description: The Targus Executive Stylus & Pen combines the functionality of a stylus with a built-in roller ball pen for traditional note-taking. Featuring a soft, durable rubber tip, this stylus makes it easy to take notes, draw, play games, or simply turn a page. Leaving no smudges or finger prints on device screen, this stylus provides typing comfort, accuracy and efficiency. Users can use the stylus with note taking applications, like Penultimate, for the ultimate high tech note taking. For traditional note-taking, stylus has an integrated roller ball pen for smooth writing. The tip of the stylus works with iPad, iPhone, iPod touch and other capacitive touch devices. With an elegant finish and a professional design, it is the perfect tool for any executive.
